title: Himalayan Salt Rock Aroma Lamp - Perfect Aromatherapy Balance
description: A 1.5-2kg Himalayan salt rock aroma lamp. Place some water and a few drops of fragrance oil in the glass dish in the top of the lamp and the heat from the bulb will warm up the oil. Not suitable for use with wax melts due to the size of the dish. Measures H:17cm W:10cm D:10cm Weight 1.8kg
